aircraft.value: Viper Strike-3 - AC-3962-711 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Emergency lighting system failure. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 04/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 05/11/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 06/11/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 07/11/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 11/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
